author: Blender Guru
description:
Here we go again 🍩

In this video you'll learn how to use Blender 5.0's core tools and techniques by making a donut.

===Links🔗===

Download Blender: https://www.blender.org/download/

Beginner Academy: https://academy.blenderguru.com/join

Keyboard Shortcut Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zPBgZAdftWa6WVa7UIFUqW_7EcqOYE0X743RqFuJL3o/edit?usp=drive_link

Blender Guru Discord: https://blenderguru.com/discord

Blender Guru: http://www.blenderguru.com 
Poliigon (My sister company): http://www.poliigon.com High-quality Models, Textures, HDRIs

=== Chapter Marks ✂️===
0:00 Intro
0:40 Blender Academy Course
0:50 Download and Installation of Blender 5.0
1:30 Interface + Navigation
6:02 Adding objects
9:32 Shade Smooth
10:27 Add another object (creating coffee mug)
12:13 Move Tool (Fix overlapping objects)
15:27 Shifting Focus
15:42 Edit Mode
17:23 Different Select Options
17:57 Delete Face (creating the opening for mug)
18:27 Add Solidify Modifier
20:40 Add Subdivision Surface Modi
title: Beginner Blender 5.0 Donut Tutorial - Part 1
